keyword: how many calories are in a guinness stout
title: How Many Calories Are in a Guinness Stout?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in a Guinness Stout with full nutrition breakdown including carbs, protein, and sodium per 12 oz serving, plus tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Guinness Stout?
assumptions: Standard Guinness Draught Stout, 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle, unopened and unpoured.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by specific variety, batch, serving size, and temperature; check labels or official sources for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A 12 oz bottle of Guinness Stout contains about 125 calories and 10 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Guinness Foreign Extra Stout (higher ABV variety)
Served as 16 oz US pint (larger serving)
Mixed with diet tonic (adds negligible calories)

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Guinness Stout bottle?
faqs.a: Approximately 125 calories in a standard 12 fl oz bottle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Guinness Stout?
faqs.a: About 10 g of carbohydrates per 12 oz serving, mostly from malt.

faqs.q: Does Guinness Stout have protein or fat?
faqs.a: It has about 1 g protein and 0 g fat per bottle.

faqs.q: How does Guinness compare to other stouts calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Guinness Draught is relatively low at 125 kcal per 12 oz; other stouts may range 150-200 kcal.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Guinness Stout?
faqs.a: Low at around 20 mg per 12 oz bottle.
